body: .load,#mainSlideArea nav,#mainSlideArea .slide,#next,#back,#globalNavOpenBtn,#globalNav .subNavBlock {display: none;}#wrapperArea,#mainSlideArea #mainSlide_1 a {display: block;}#mainSlideArea {margin: 0 auto 50px;;display: block;width: 1400px;height: 566px;position: static;}#mainSlideArea #mainSlide_1 {margin: 0 auto;display: block;width: 1400px;height: 566px;opacity: 1;position: relative;}#mainSlideArea #mainSlideAreaInner .mainSlideMsg {opacity: 1;}#mainSlideArea #mainSlideAreaInner .msg_1 {margin: -90px 0 0 0;width: 1400px;text-align: center;left: 0;}#globalNav .menu1 {opacity: 1;top: 15px;} You need to have JavaScript enabled in your browser to view this site. Contact Us menu Language Global - English Benelux - Français Benelux - Nederlands Canada - English Canada - Français Deutschland - Deutsch España - Español France - Français India - English Italia – Italiano Singapore - English Türkiye - Türkçe UK - English USA - English 日本 - 日本語 中国 - 简体中文 대한민국 - 한국어 Business Fields Products Solutions Case Study About DIGI DIGI provides products and solutions that improve efficiency in the retail industry and strives to provide support that exceeds customer expectations. DIGI provides leading-edge solutions to the food industry with a wide range of products and the latest technology. DIGI provides comprehensive solutions that increase productivity in the logistics industry, employing high precision machinery and systems at sites such as industrial plants, logistics centers, and warehouses. DIGI provides innovative solutions that streamline operations and increase profitability in the hospitality industry. Support service for maintaining products – Cloud service for maintaining business Retail Food Industry Logistics Hospitality Service & Cloud Products DIGI Shop&Go Shopping has never been more enjoyableCheckout is smooth and easy – just 30 seconds and you GO! SM-6000 Be free from limits. Be free from the status quo. AW-5600ATII Fully integrated weigh-wrap-label system designed for operational comfort and environmental friendliness HI-700 High speed dynamic weigh price labeler ESL Wireless, High Contrast Display Electronic Tag AI picking carts Picking carts with built-in scales enable simultaneous picking and quantity verification More Products Solutions Solution with linerless labels Linerless labels allow variable length and flexible print formats T@POP Solution Agile and Flexible Pricing Updates Solution for produce area Intelligent scales provide comfortable self-service experience Picking Solution Error rates of zero are in ready reach Self-payment checkout solution for specialty stores and mini-supermarkets The customer and checkout staff work together to make checkout speedy and clean Delious - Restaurant Management Solution Full support for food & beverage operations, both at the head office and in the field More Solutions Customer Case Studies Huber's Butchery (Singapore) Rejuvenate local’s largest specialty butcher store with the latest SM-6000 Unicoop Tirreno (Italia) DIGI solutions change the rules of the game for future retail supermarkets HeMa Life Centre (China) DIGI plays a key role in a pioneering omnichannel retailing initiative in Shanghai More Case Studies News 29 May, 2020 News Releases New Product - AW-5600ATII Auto-Infeed, Fully integrated weigh-wrap-label solution with automatic infeed conveyor for more efficient operation and high productivity. 24 Apr, 2020 News Releases New Case Study - SM-6000SSR makes its first inauguration in largest supermarket chains in Italy 26 Mar, 2020 News Releases New case study video - SM-6000 at specialty butcher in Singapore 30 Jan, 2020 News Releases Explore the New Frontier in Retail with DIGI at EuroShop 2020! 20 Jan, 2020 Press Releases Established the Ecological System Business Unit on January 1, 2020 in Response to the UN SDGs Global Call to Action More News Go to page top For More Details Contact Form Business Fields Retail Food Industry Logistics Hospitality Service & Cloud Products By Category By Model Keyword Solutions Retail Solutions Food Industry Solutions Logistics Solutions Hospitality Case Study Retail Food Industry Logistics Hospitality About DIGI Company Profile Access Showroom DIGI Group Support Consumables Careers Contact Us Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Trademarks Sitemap Country - Language   Global - English Benelux - Français Benelux - Nederlands Canada - English Canada - Français Deutschland - Deutsch España - Español France - Français India - English Italia – Italiano Singapore - English Türkiye - Türkçe UK - English USA - English 日本 - 日本語 中国 - 简体中文 대한민국 - 한국어 © Teraoka Seiko Co., Ltd. All Rights Reserved. var getURL = String(window.location);$(function() {//トップキービジュアルカルーセル$('#mainSlideArea').slick({accessibility: true,autoplay: true,autoplaySpeed: 5000,speed: 600,responsive: [{breakpoint: 768,settings: {dots: true,arrows: false}}]});//共通マウスオーバー$(".btnBlock.default").find("li").prepend('');//右向きのマウスオーバー$(".btnBlock:not(:animated),#localNav:not(:animated),#localNav1-2:not(:animated)").find("a").on("mouseenter",function(){if(!($(this).parent("li").hasClass("current"))){$(this).stop().animate({backgroundColor:"#009c84"});$(this).parent().find(".ar").stop().animate({right:"6px"}, 300, "easeInBack");}}).on("mouseleave",function(){if(!($(this).parent("li").hasClass("current"))){$(this).stop().animate({backgroundColor:"#333333"});$(this).parent().find(".ar").stop().animate({right:"12px"}, 200, "easeOutBack");}});});function checkOffset() {if($('#contact-float').offset().top + $('#contact-float').height() >= $('#footerNav').offset().top - 10)$('#contact-float').css('position', 'absolute');if($(document).scrollTop() + window.innerHeight < $('#footerNav').offset().top)$('#contact-float').css('position', 'fixed'); // restore when you scroll up}var isContactDisplay = false;$(document).scroll(function() {checkOffset();var scroll_pos = window.pageYOffset;if(scroll_pos < 1) {if( isContactDisplay ) $('#contact-float').fadeOut(400, function() {isContactDisplay = false;});} else {if( !isContactDisplay ) $('#contact-float').fadeIn(300,function() {isContactDisplay = true;});}});var flatheights;$(function () {flatheights = (function () {(function () {var sets = [], temp = [];if (temp.length) sets.push(temp);$.each(sets, function () {$(this).flatHeights();});}());});function slickify() {var windowsize = $(window).width();var $carousel = $('.boxList .block');if (windowsize < 768) {$carousel.not('.slick-initialized').slick({arrows: false,slidesToShow: 1,infinite: false,variableWidth: true,dots: true,centerMode: false,});} else {if($carousel.hasClass('slick-initialized')) {$carousel.slick('unslick');}}}$( window ).resize(function() {slickify();});window.onload = function() {slickify();};/** header部分の地球アイコン部分* クリックしたらぺらっと出てくるナビゲーション*/var $langselecterdUl = $('#headerContents .selectLang ul');$("#headerContents .selectLang .selected").on('click', function () {if($langselecterdUl.css('display')=='none'){$langselecterdUl.slideDown(800,"easeOutExpo");}else {$langselecterdUl.slideUp(300, "easeOutExpo");};});var $langselecterdUlFooter = $('#footer .selectLang ul');//footer searchArea$("#footer .selectLang .selected").on('click', function () {if($langselecterdUlFooter.css('display')=='none'){$langselecterdUlFooter.slideDown('slow');}else {$langselecterdUlFooter.slideUp('slow');};});// ヘッダー・フッターの言語選択の対応// ヘッダーの言語選択$('#headerContents').find('.selectLang ul').children('li').click(function(){if($(this).attr('class') !== ''){// 選択した言語をCookieに保存$.cookie('DIGI_BROWSER_LANG_URL', $(this).attr('class'), { expires: 7, path:'/' });}});// フッターの言語選択$('#footerInner').find('.selectLang ul').children('li').click(function(){if($(this).attr('class') !== ''){// 選択した言語をCookieに保存$.cookie('DIGI_BROWSER_LANG_URL', $(this).attr('class'), { expires: 7, path:'/' });}});//new menu$('#header #menu').click(function(e){e.preventDefault();$(this).toggleClass('active');$('.globalNav').slideToggle();});//matchHeight$('.boxList .box .body').matchHeight();}); var fHeight = $("#contact-float").outerHeight();$(function(){//console.log(fHeight);$("#backToTopNav div").pageTopSW({//ボタンが固定される領域を設定stopArea : $("#footerNav"),//ボタンの位置を調整left : 1050,bottom : fHeight,//スピードとeasingを調節easing:"swing",pagetop:true});});
